price: 41. Dan ingatlah akan hamba Kami Ayyub ketika dia menyeru Tuhannya, “Sesungguhnya aku diganggu setan dengan penderitaan dan bencana.”
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بِنُصۡبٖ وَعَذَابٍ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-shayṭānu binuṣ'bin waʿadhābin
